name: Neat-o Thrifty Defense
description:
This game was made by Hipreme and CJGladback as an impromptu team formed shortly after Discord Jam #4 started. This game is still in very early development and it is not playable right now, but it has some things that make a tower defense game. And every bug is just added to the hoard pestering this thrift store.

The enemies can't be destroyed and they spawn forever. The inventory system was not functioning, so instead of picking up salvage to build towers and arm them, you can place a single type of pre-armed tower as much as you like. Bonus: it aims without even pointing.
